name: Edge of Night
description: Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects. Then, gain 15% bonus Attack Speed.

name: Crownguard
description: Combat start: Gain a 25% max Health Shield for 8 seconds. When the shield expires, gain 25 Ability Power.

name: Giant Slayer
description: Gain 20% additional Damage Amp against enemies with more than 1750 max Health.

name: Blue buff
description: Gain 10 Mana after casting. When the holder gets a takedown, they deal 5% more damage for 8 seconds.

name: Guardbreaker
description: After damaging a Shield, gain 15% additional Damage Amp for 3 seconds.

name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
description: Attacks grant 5% stacking Attack Speed.

name: Dragon's Claw
description: Gain 9% max health. Every 2 seconds, heal 2.5% max Health.

name: Spear of Shojin
description: Attacks grant 5 bonus Mana.

name: Steadfast Heart
description: Gain 8% Durability. While above 50% Health, instead gain 15% Durability.

name: Nashor's Tooth
description: After casting an Ability, gain 60% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

name: Jeweled Gauntlet
description: Abilities can critically strike. If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

name: Last Whisper
description: Physical damage 30% Sunders the target for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

name: Protector's Vow
description: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts 5 seconds and gain 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist.

name: Bramble Vest
description: Gain 7% max health. Take 8% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal 100 magic damage to all adjacent enemies.

name: Warmog's Armor
description: Gain 12% max health.

name: Runaan's Hurricane
description: Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing 60% Attack Damage AD as physical damage.

name: Redemption
description: Heal allies within 1 hex for 15% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also gain 10% Durability for 5 seconds (this does not stack).

name: Bloodthirster
description: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

name: Hextech Gunblade
description: Heal the lowest percent Health ally for 25% of damage dealt.

name: Statikk Shiv
description: Every 3rd attack deals 35 magic damage and 30% Shreds 4 enemies for 5 seconds.

name: Deathblade
description: Perfect peace and calm for the holder - and all who face it.

name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
description: Gain 10 Armor and 10 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

name: Morellonomicon
description: Attacks and Abilities deal 1% Burn and 33% Wound to enemies for 10 seconds.

name: Red Buff
description: Attacks and Abilities 1% Burn and 33% Wound enemies for 5 seconds.

name: Ionic Spark
description: 30% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 160% of the Mana spent.

name: Thief's Gloves
description: Each round: Equip 2 random items.

name: Adaptive Helm
description: Combat start: Gain different bonuses based on starting position. Front Two Rows: 40 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 1 Mana when struck by an attack. Back Two Rows: 15 Ability Power. Gain 10 Mana every 3 seconds.

name: Infinity Edge
description: Abilities can critically strike. If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

name: Sunfire Cape
description: Gain 8% max Health. Every 2 seconds, deal 1% Burn and 33% Wound to an enemy within 2 hexes for 10 seconds.

name: Sterak's Gage
description: Once per combat at 60% Health, gain 25% max Health and 35% Attack Damage.

name: Rabadon's Deathcap
description: This humble hat can help you make, or unmake, the world itself.

name: Archangel's Staff
description: Combat start: Gain 30 Ability Power every 5 seconds in combat.

name: Titan's Resolve
description: Gain 2% Attack Damage and 2 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times. At full stacks, gain 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist.

name: Evenshroud
description: 30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 15 seconds of combat. Sunder: Reduce Armor

name: Hand Of Justice
description: Gain 2 effects: 15% Attack Damage and 15 Ability Power. 12% Omnivamp. While above 50% health, double the Attack Damage and Ability Power. While below 50% Health, double the Omnivamp.

name: Quicksilver
description: Combat start: Gain immunity to crowd control for 18 seconds. During this time, gain 3% Attack Speed every 2 seconds.
